description: four putti at top--three holding a square banner, the fourth flying horizontally at top center; head and PR shoulder of a figure at bottom, LLQ; sketchy
dimension:
6 1/2 x 7 1/8 in. (16.51 x 18.1 cm) (sheet, irregular)
15 9/16 x 14 3/8 in. (39.53 x 36.51 cm) (outer frame)
medium: Pen and brown ink and wash over black and red chalk
provenance: Barozzi Collection, Venice. [Colnaghi, London; before 1968]. Sale, Sotheby's, London, July 7, 1999, no. 128, for Â£3,450, to Flavia Ormand for Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1999-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Putti Floating a Banner
